preface.title: jsXe User's Manual
preface.para: jsXe is the Java Simple XML Editor. Out of the box it provides a tree view, DTD/Schema introspection and validation. It's aim is to provide a framework for XML editing through any number of views that can be loaded at runtime as plugins.

partintro.para: This part of the manual outlines how to use jsXe, key concepts, and commands.

chapter.title: Conventions
chapter.para: Several concepts are used throughout the jsXe user interface and this manual.

row.entry: A document view is a view in jsXe that is used to edit XML documents. Examples are the Tree View and Source View.
